title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Smart Power Corp

content.text: Smart Power Corp undergoes an initial public offering (IPO) and becomes a publicly traded company.
Smart Power Corp announces a 2-for-1 stock split. Each existing share is now split into two shares.
Smart Power Corp acquires a smaller competitor, expanding its market presence.
Smart Power Corp announces a 3-for-1 stock split. Each existing share is now split into three shares.
Smart Power Corp releases a new product line, leading to increased investor interest.
Smart Power Corp declares a dividend for the first time in its history, rewarding shareholders with cash payments.
Smart Power Corp announces a merger with a larger energy company, resulting in the acquisition of Smart Power Corp by the larger entity.

news.headline: CREG and VGAS are among utility movers
